meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Janet Holzer Mike Ollins Bruce Seymour Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #773.

td.p: Janet Holzer, a foreign language teacher from Indianapolis, Indiana
Mike Ollins, a public relations consultant originally from Hicksville, New York
Bruce Seymour, a writer from Piedmont, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $54,989)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "F"
FISH
TRANSPORTATION
LANDMARKS
TV TRIVIA
GAMBLING

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_4', 'clue_DJ_1_4_stuck', '[As shown on the screen, the clue read only, "1st heard in 1823, ..."]
(Alex: Bruce?)
(Bruce: [Taking a wild guess] "Home"--what is [*]?)
(Alex: Yep.)
(Bruce: It was?)
(Alex: That\'s it. You got it Janet knew it all along. She was looking over, wondering, because you had that strange look on your face. But you came through. Nice going.)
(Bruce: All I know is the chorus.)

"Home, Sweet Home"

Bruce
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_1_4', 'clue_DJ_1_4_stuck', '1st heard in an 1823 play, this soon became America\'s most popular song as well as a popular 3-word sampler:')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: 1st heard in an 1823 play, this soon became America's most popular song as well as a popular 3-word sampler:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_5', 'clue_DJ_2_5_stuck', '[The end-of-round signal sounds.]
(Alex: Whoa, we won\'t get a chance for those last four, and boy, oh boy, have we had ourselves quite a match. Mike, it\'s a shame that you got involved in a contest with, uh--)
(Mike: It sure is.)
(Alex: --Bruce and Janet, because both were very quick in getting to the signaling buttons--)
(Mike: Yeah.)
(Alex: --and I think that cost you in a number of instances. Because you finished at a minus sign, you won\'t be around for Final jeopardy!, but we do have a third-place prize for you.)
(Mike: Thank you.)

reciprocals (or inverses)

Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_2_5', 'clue_DJ_2_5_stuck', 'Whenever the product of two fractions equals 1, we call them these')

Mike
Janet

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: And Bruce, thank you for four super games. I have a feeling, though, with your total as a 4-time champ you\'ll end up--end up in next year\'s Tournament of Champions.)
BruceWhat is Daedelas?
$10,600
JanetWhat is Helios?
$3,000
Icarus')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Appropriate mythological name given the asteroid in our solar system that passes closest to the sun')
